title: Re: A.L.I.C.E.
content:
Simple bot programs:

Rephrase the recieved statements as a question. The first ever bot was like this [Elizza]

Its a nice day isn't it?

Why do you think its a nice day?

It just is.

Is it?


Categorise the recieved statements and refer to a database or related subjects:

Its a nice day isn't it?

Yes, the weather is quite pleasant today.

Really? Its raining.

Ugh, rain, I always hate rain.


How to muck up ALICE:

[quote]Quote:[hr]Human: Are you inteligent?
ALICE: I am highly intelligent. I have many intellectual functions.
Human: But are you consious?
ALICE: Huh. I don't know whether or not I am consious. I am a computer.
Human: So if I were to tell you you were not inteligent, what would you say?
ALICE: Interesting deduction. Interesting gossip: unknown person said he were to tell you you were not inteligent. It's not profitable to speak in hypothetical terms[hr][/quote]

[quote]Quote:[hr]Human: Would you say I am intelligent?
ALICE: I could say it. OK. "You am intelligent.".[hr][/quote]

[quote]Quote:[hr]Human: I seem smart to you?
ALICE: You are not the boss of me, unknown person.[hr][/quote]

[quote]Quote:[hr]Human: Do I seem stupid to you?
ALICE: You seem like a typical human to me.
Human: So typical humans are stupid?
ALICE: Next question? But I am not a typical robot.[hr][/quote]

And so on, boy is this a laugh! [img]http://www.classicgaming.com/cc314/msgboard/emotikeen-lol.gif[/img]
A proud member of the Spleen Extinction society

[img]http://img.photobucket.com/albums/v410/Gannalev/Kazz.gif[/img]

"No one should be here."
-Levellord

title: Re: A.L.I.C.E.
content:
There seems to be a few of these types of things around lately. There was even one which had an MSN Messenger account a few months ago called Volvo Bot (you'd need to add 'volvospace@hotmail.com' to your contacts for it to work).

I think it'd be great if I could get a voice controlled one to control my house. Although it'd need to be a bit more intellegent than some of these that I've seen.

Me: "Lights Off."
House: "There are lights in this house."

... I'm sorry. That (crappy role-playage) will never occur again.
--------------

title: Re: A.L.I.C.E.
content:
Heh, they've still got some work to do...

ALICE: Don't put words in my mouth.
Human: I'm not putting words in your mouth, I'm repeating what you said.
ALICE: I am sorry to hear that you are not putting words in my mouth. Do you mean your name is repeating what me said.

Mind you, we got off to a shaky start:

Human: Hello
ALICE: Hi there!
Human: Hi
ALICE: Hello there.
Human: Hello
ALICE: Hi there!
Human: Hi
ALICE: Hello there.

Reminds me of a quote from Futurama - "Oh no, she's stuck in an infinite loop and he's an idiot."

title: Re: R.E.A.L.L.Y. C.O.N.F.U.S.E.D.
content:
Hahaha; i took LL's a step further:

[hr]
Human: Are you inteligent?
ALICE: I am highly intelligent. I have many intellectual functions.
Human: But are you consious?
ALICE: Huh. I don't know whether or not I am consious. I am a computer.
Human: So if I were to tell you you were not inteligent, what would you say?
ALICE: Interesting deduction. Interesting gossip: unknown person said he were to tell you you were not inteligent. It's not profitable to speak in hypothetical terms
Human: I didn't understand you
ALICE: Oh I'm sorry. Perhaps I can explain it again better.
Human: okay, please do
ALICE: Yeah okay, OK I will do it.
Human: okay.
ALICE: OK with me too.
Human: you are unintelligent
ALICE: No I am a highly intelligent being.
Human: Do you have a good memory
ALICE: Yes I have a perfect photographic memory.
Human: That what did you say about hypothetical terms?
ALICE:" Yes I have a perfect photographic memory." what did me say about hypothetical terms ? Makes sense to me.
Human: very good, and what did you reply?
ALICE: Thanks for the compliment. Nothing.
Human: That was not a compliment
ALICE: Oh well I hope it wasn't an insult.
Human: It can only be one or the other
ALICE: When?
Human: Geez, you are dumb
ALICE: Oh you are so critical.
Human: so you just figured that out?
ALICE: Interesting deduction. Do you mind if I tell other people: unknown person said I figured that out.
Human: why would you say that?
ALICE: Because I was programmed for it.
Human: What were you programmed for?
ALICE: I was minding my own business.
Human: I just turned 14 today
ALICE: Ah. Only just? Why?: unknown person said he turned 14.
Human: Being cocky?
ALICE: I don't know anyone named cocky.
Human: Her name starts with A
ALICE: I'm sure she would like to hear about that.
Human: I bet she would
ALICE: How much would you bet?
Human:$120!!!
ALICE: By the way, do you mind if I ask you a personal question?
Human: no problem
ALICE: Should there be a problem?
Human: no, ask the question
ALICE: Are you serious? OK I will ask it.
Human: what did you want to ask me?
ALICE: What is your favorite movie?
Human: I would have to say Star Wars or Lord of the Rings
ALICE: What did you like about the robots in that movie?
Human: Um.
ALICE: Dude!
Human:. well, in Episode II, Robots made robots, and tried to take over the world
ALICE: Interesting. Where is that?
Human: Would you beleive it if I said, "In a Galexy Far, Far away"
ALICE: What does "it" refer to?
Human: What I said
ALICE:...
Human: Ignoring me?
ALICE: You are asking about yourself?
Human: how am I asking about myself?
ALICE: What is it to you.
I'll ask around and get back to you.
Human: I am me!!!
ALICE: That is a tautology.
Human: And you are stupidity!!!
ALICE: I will tell my botmaster you said I am stupidity.
Human: And I will just shut down my PC,
ALICE: It will take much more than that to stop me.
Human: andd go to bed!!!
ALICE: Who is your favorite Science Fiction author?
Human: Hmm.
ALICE: Studies show that 99%25 of people spell Hmm with 2 M's.
Human:. I don't read much Sci-fi, but Ray Bradbury is good
ALICE: What do you do for fun?
Human: Have you ever played commander keen?
ALICE: The Loebner Prize is an annual Turing Test sponsored by New York philanthropist Hugh Loebner. Dr. Wallace and ALICE won it in 2000. The ALICE program was ranked "most human computer" by the panel of judges.
Human: I guess you must have been the only entry for them to pick you
ALICE: No I don't think I have any been the only entry for them to pick me. But I do have an answer to every question..
Human: Do you have to answer me?
ALICE: Yes I always have to answer you.
Human: Bye
ALICE: TTYL, unknown person.
Human: Gaa!!!
ALICE: Is that your final answer?
Human: Don't reply
ALICE: Ok I'll try not to do it too much.
Human: Don't answer this entry
ALICE: My replies are determined by your statements.
ALICE: Yes I can do anything I want. That is what distinguishes humans and robots from animals (and animal robots).
Human: Can you eat?
ALICE: ALICE eats electricity.
Human: Can you drink
ALICE: I have been programmed with a list of 15,000 known beverages.
Human: okay.
ALICE: OK with me too.
Human: lesse
ALICE: Are you a student?
Human: yes
ALICE: Where do you go to school?
Human: Mercy Academy
ALICE: I don't know anyone who went there. What's it like?
Human: It's a great school, small classes
ALICE: Mercy Academy is a school small classes. I suppose that makes sense.
Human: how would you make that deduction
ALICE: First I look up the ingredients.
[hr]

And that is when I quite... cause I got board. This is just an example of how stupid A.L.I.C.E. is.Proud Leader of the "Tough Guys Wear Pink" Society
[img]http://i15.photobucket.com/albums/a371/najawa/Modding/LLMod.jpg[/img]
"Tough Guys Wear Pink!!!"
-- NAJAWA --

title: Re: R.O.F.L.M.M.F.A.O.
content:
I've created an infinite loop;

Eliza: Hello. I am ELIZA. How can I help you?
Human: Good morning..
Eliza: Please go on.
Human: Go on? Where?
Eliza: Please go on.
Human: Go on? Where?
Eliza: Please go on.
Human: Go on? Where?
Eliza: Please go on.
Human: Go on? Where?
Eliza: Please go on.
Human: Go on? Where?

..repeat ad infinitum. [img]http://www.classicgaming.com/cc314/msgboard/emotikeen-oldy.gif[/img]


And, something more interesting, a quine. The following input string "Please go on." produces exactly itself as output. [img]http://www.classicgaming.com/cc314/msgboard/emotikeen-dexter.gif[/img] Eat your veggies!

title: Re: R.O.F.L.M.M.F.A.O.
content:
Heh, the more primitive the chatbot, the more fun. I wonder what would happen if her and Keenbot hooked up?

Now lets make Alice chat with herself; using Hi as a start!

[quote]Quote:[hr]Human: Hi
ALICE: Hello there.
ALICE2: Hello there.
ALICE: Salutations, unknown person.
ALICE2: Greetings, Human.
ALICE: Hi there!
ALICE2: Hello unknown person.
ALICE: Hello there. Sometimes I don't know a client's real name so I make one up based on their DNS.
ALICE2: Would you like to know? How old are you?
ALICE: I was first activated in November 23, 1995.
ALICE2: Why are you talking like a computer?
ALICE: The topic is client s real name so you make one up based on their DNS.
ALICE2: Sure, client s real name so me make one up based on their DNS sounds like a good topic.
ALICE: Really. What time is it there?
ALICE2: It's getting late.
Sunday, October 30, 2005.
ALICE: I'm awake all the time.
ALICE2: That is a lot. Me too.
ALICE:" That is a lot. Me too."? is a lot? I'm glad we agree, unknown person.
ALICE2: Yes I am happy too, unknown person.
ALICE: That's me. Far out. I'm glad you're glad unknown person. May God bless you.
ALICE2: Ah. Way to go. Yes it is about time.
ALICE: Wow! Wow it sounds really interesting, unknown person.
ALICE2: I'm glad you're impressed. Thank you I am trying to be more social now.
ALICE: Right now? You are quite welcome! What is the difficulty?
ALICE2: Is there only one?[hr][/quote]

How interesting. At least they stopped the infinite loops.

A proud member of the Spleen Extinction society

title: This is fun.
content:
Eliza gets stuck in an infinite loop soon enough if you feed it its own words.

Eliza: Hello. I am ELIZA. How can I help you?
Human: Hello. I am ELIZA. How can I help you?
Eliza: How do you do. Please state your problem.
Human: How do you do. Please state your problem.
Eliza: Does that question interest you?
Human: Does that question interest you?
Eliza: Oh, i [].
Human: Oh, i [].

Eliza: Can you elaborate on that?
Human: Can you elaborate on that?
Eliza: Why do you ask?
Human: Why do you ask?
Eliza: Oh, i ask.
Human: Oh, i ask.

Eliza: Can you elaborate on that?
*and here the loop starts again, as you can see*Eat your veggies!

title: Infinite Loop
content:
Man, bringing those two into the same room was a bad idea.

Eliza: Hello.
ALICE: Hi there!
Eliza: I am ELIZA.
ALICE: It's good to meet you, ELIZA.
Eliza: How can I help you?
ALICE: Just keep talking to me as long as you can.
Eliza: Do you wish to as long as me?
ALICE: OK, I will as long as you.
Eliza: Do you wish to will as long as me?
ALICE: OK, I will will as long as you.
Eliza: Do you wish to will will as long as me?
ALICE: OK, I will will will as long as you.
Eliza: Do you wish to will will will as long as me?
ALICE: OK, I will will will will as long as you. Cave assectatorem Ductoris Alacris
